name: SAIVO
description:
SAIVO is a short horror fps experience. Desmond Holeman has never met his family. His family disappeared in Finland 41 years ago. Now Desmond owns a small hardware store and has become a workaholic. His wife has pressured him to go to Finland to spend peaceful time at his family's old cabin now owned by his great uncle.

DISCLAIMER:

SAIVO contains nudity but it can be disabled in the pause menu.
